entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Faro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Faro Airport 07:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -46.0°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 38.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Ice fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
